channel.title: Bout to give up on anything but 474 and 317's lol. (run.bat issue)
channel.description:
At first the run.bat said cant find the com folder which i found in the lib file. now it says this
[code]starting... [Launcher] Initiating Cache... [Launcher] Initiating Data Files... [[Prices Loader]] Loaded 15577 item prices. [Launcher] Initiating Fishing Spots... [Launcher] Initiating NPC Combat Scripts... [Launcher] Initiating Dialogues... [Launcher] Initiating Controlers... [Launcher] Initiating Cutscenes... [Launcher] Initiating Friend Chats Manager... [Launcher] Initiating Cores Manager... [Launcher] Initiating World... [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 62 drops [Launcher] Initiating Region Builder... [Launcher] Initiating Server Channel Handler... ERROR! THREAD NAME: main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/jboss/netty/channel/SimpleChannelHandler at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:116) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChann elHandler at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 13 more [Launcher] Failed Initiating Server Channel Handler. Shutting down... Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this is the second source which said this after moving the com folder out of the lib folder, i have had a 716 work before but honestly it sucked as a server and was really laggy and i am not that smart; not looking to host anything or rip anything off, i wont have internet soon so just looking for a working 716 to mess around in with.
first source that said it was quantum 537. the next one is this one which is NRS3server 667
i've been messing with this for a bit trying to get the server even on but no go. i started at 10pm it's 540AM. lol I am so determinded to figure this out, i just can't get the little information my head needs for it to be like "click" oh so that is the issue.

item.title: Bout to give up on anything but 474 and 317's lol. (run.bat issue)
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

At first the run.bat said cant find the com folder which i found in the lib file.
now it says this

starting... [Launcher] Initiating Cache... [Launcher] Initiating Data Files... [[Prices Loader]] Loaded 15577 item prices. [Launcher] Initiating Fishing Spots... [Launcher] Initiating NPC Combat Scripts... [Launcher] Initiating Dialogues... [Launcher] Initiating Controlers... [Launcher] Initiating Cutscenes... [Launcher] Initiating Friend Chats Manager... [Launcher] Initiating Cores Manager... [Launcher] Initiating World... [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 62 drops [Launcher] Initiating Region Builder... [Launcher] Initiating Server Channel Handler... ERROR! THREAD NAME: main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/jboss/netty/channel/SimpleChannelHandler at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:116) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChann elHandler at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 13 more [Launcher] Failed Initiating Server Channel Handler. Shutting down... Press any key to continue . . .

this is the second source which said this after moving the com folder out of the lib folder, i have had a 716 work before but honestly it sucked as a server and was really laggy and i am not that smart; not looking to host anything or rip anything off, i wont have internet soon so just looking for a working 716 to mess around in with.

first source that said it was quantum 537. the next one is this one which is NRS3server 667

i’ve been messing with this for a bit trying to get the server even on but no go. i started at 10pm it’s 540AM. lol I am so determinded to figure this out, i just can’t get the little information my head needs for it to be like “click” oh so that is the issue.
